item.title: Help with script
item.dc:creator: @therave39 therave39
item.description:
@therave39 wrote:

Hey, I’m using this AutoSeller script I found (not mine) and it will right click my item, then the mouse will move somewhere else. Can anyone have a look and offer a fix or suggestion?

[scar] program New; {.include osi.txt} var he,heh: integer; var bitmap: integer;

///////Start at any general store and have the item in NOTES
//////Notes in first inv slot
//////General store window open

Procedure LoadBmps;
begin
bitmap := BitmapFromString(15, 7,
‘5D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447’ +
‘5D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFF’ +
‘FFFFFF5D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF’ +
‘5D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447’ +
‘5D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D5447’ +
‘FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF’ +
‘0000000000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D5447000000FFFFFF’ +
‘FFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447’ +
‘FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447’ +
‘5D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000’ +
‘5D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF’ +
‘0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000’);
end;

procedure seller;
begin
FindColorTolerance(he,heh,7839919,572,218,598,239,100)
mouse(he,heh,15,15,false)
sleep(100+random(300))
FindBitmap(bitmap,x,y)
mouse(x,y,15,15,true)
end;

begin
loadbmps;
repeat
seller;
until(1>2);
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
